{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$25.4M in 2019-2020** on contracts with BRONTE CONSTRUCTION.

Across 1 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (100%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 417% and the average number of amendments was 5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$23.6M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.15 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$29.2M. The longest contract was 1.15 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$29.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}

{{< /details >}}
